name: Furi2Play!
summary:
刚刚用「女装正太*」冲了一发.
天啦,我觉得我以后都不会对普通黄涩O起了>_ <#伪娘什么的最喜欢啦 

F2P! is a slice of life ,lewd , romantic comedy series that features a group of foreigners in Japan and their relationships with each other. 

Story and Art by PeaCh
